name: Zwillinge
description:
Zwillinge is a に player competitive game about delayed input.

Players send signals to receivers to pull them to their side. The player with more receivers pushes their influence farther in a satisfying tug of war. Once one player has conquered 70% of the screen, they win.

Designed for two Dual Shock 4 Controllers

Created for Train Jam 2017 by Lily Ling, Laurenz Riklin, Chao Jin, Zed Zhou, and Sam Von Ehren.
